item.title: ⛩ The Inner Gate
item.description:
How We Keep It Human

You can’t stumble into this space.
That’s intentional.

There’s no sign-up page.
No “create an account.”
Instead, you’ll get something symbolic: an Elder Key.

This is your token.
Your pass.
Not just for access—but for intent.

This space works because we know who’s here.
We keep it small, kind, and warm.

There’s light here. But it’s a fire we tend together.

**Next: [[🍃The Whisper Grove]] Where the conversation flows. Private, soft-spoken, and human.

item.title: 🍃The Whisper Grove
item.description:
Where We Actually Talk

This isn’t a forum.
It’s not a feed.
It’s not WhatsApp.

It’s quieter. More human.

We use a system called Nostr.
It lets us chat, share notes, and even do calls in a space we control.
You’ll pick a key. Join a private relay. And connect directly.

It sounds complex. But I’ll help you.
And once it’s set up, it’s just… peaceful.

Like a campfire for kindred minds.
